code: export default function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{cards:[],gameName:null,blueTurn:false,redCards:0,blueCards:0,winner:null,blueTeamFirst:false};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'LOAD_GAME_FULFILLED':{var newData=action.payload.data;return Object.assign({},state,newData);}case'UPDATE_GAME':{var _newData=action.payload;return Object.assign({},state,_newData);}default:{return state;}}}
